<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Thrangund has fallen to your mighty blow</rgb>
'My spear will run you through!'
'You have done great work to secure the Necromancer's Gate. Report to me back at camp and we will discuss the next phase of the assault.'
<rgb=#00FF00>The First Ward has been claimed</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>The Second Ward has been claimed</rgb>

<rgb=#00FF00>The counterattack has been defeated. It is safe to press on</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>The Necromancer's Gate has fallen. The heart of Dol Guldur is open for assault</rgb>
The Necromancer's Gate marks the entrance to the heart of Dol Guldur's outer fortifications. To assault the fortress, the gate must fall.
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Update: As the lantern is extinguished, an angry Orc-defiler appears</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: The sulphurous odour of burning lanterns wafts from beyond the Second Ward</rgb>
'It is time to begin the final assault of the fortress. The first step is to capture these outer defences.'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: A wailing echoes from the south</rgb>
'If you can push forward and claim the Necromancer's Gate, then the heart of Dol Guldur will be opened for our forces.'
'This mission cannot fail. Without the Gate, Dol Guldur stands unassailable. Fight with strength and honour!'
'This is a great victory for the Golden Host.'
<rgb=#00FF00>The counterattack has been defeated. The Third Ward is secure. It is safe to press on</rgb>
The Control Point has been cleared. The banner may be claimed for the Free Peoples.

The Sorcerer's Ascent has been cleared. The banner may be claimed for the Free Peoples
The First Ward is the first step on the road to taking the Necromancer's Gate.
The Necromancer's Gate has been cleared. The banner may be claimed for the Free Peoples
First Ward
The Second Ward provides a vantage point over all of Mirkwood below. It is crucial to take so that reinforcements may approach in safety.
The Second Ward has been cleared. The banner may be claimed for the Free Peoples
Second Ward
The courtyard of the Third Ward guards the entrances to several inner chambers of the fortress, most bunks for the Enemy's legions.
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: The flames of the lanterns ahead should be quenched</rgb>
Third Ward
The Fourth Ward is a seemingly ramshackle arrangement of tents and debris, but a number of the Enemy's leaders camp there to stay close to their troops.
Fourth Ward
Sorcerer's Ascent
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: Thunderous footsteps echo from the southern walkway</rgb>
The Sorcerer's Ascent is the final defence of the Necromancer's Gate and is well fortified on a steep incline.
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Update: As the lanterns are extinguished, an angry priest appears</rgb>
Necromancer's Gate
The Necromancer's Gate guards the heart of Dol Guldur's defences. It must fall in order to besiege the true fortress.
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Lavalug has fallen to your mighty blow</rgb>

'You make for an unworthy sacrifice!'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Update: A roar echoes through Dol Guldur. Dinner has been served</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Gortag has fallen to your mighty blow</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: A slab of aurochs-meat is sizzling next to the fire ahead</rgb>
'Dol Guldur will be your grave!'
'You will die!'
